entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:13 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain near noon then to rain this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this morning and early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
